product_descriptions: eBike T101: High-performance electric bicycle with advanced components and sleek design
Forks: Durable suspension forks for smooth ride on various terrains
Frame: Lightweight aluminum frame with internal cable routing
Seat: Ergonomic seat with memory foam for extended comfort
Handlebar: Adjustable handlebar with integrated display mount
Bearings: Sealed cartridge bearings for smooth, low-maintenance operation
Wheels: 27.5-inch alloy wheels with reinforced spokes
Wheel: Individual 27.5-inch alloy wheel compatible with tubeless tires
Thru_Axle: 15mm front and 12mm rear thru-axles for improved stiffness
Tires: Puncture-resistant, all-terrain tires with reflective sidewalls
Drive_Train: 11-speed drivetrain system for versatile gear range
Cassette: 11-speed cassette with wide gear ratio for varied terrain
Crank: Forged aluminum crank arms with integrated torque sensor
Brakes: Hydraulic disc brakes for powerful, all-weather stopping
Brake_Lever: Ergonomic brake levers with reach adjustment
Gear_Lever: Intuitive trigger shifters for precise gear changes
Front_Derailleur: Electronic front derailleur for smooth shifting
Rear_Derailleur: Electronic rear derailleur with motor-driven actuation
Chain: Rust-resistant, high-strength chain optimized for e-bike use
Bottom_Bracket: Sealed cartridge bottom bracket for durability
Battery: 36V, 14Ah lithium-ion battery with smart BMS
Motor: 250W mid-drive motor with 80Nm torque output
Control_Unit: Advanced controller with Bluetooth connectivity and app support
Bolt: Stainless steel bolts in various sizes for assembly
Washer: Nylon and metal washers for proper component fit
Motor_Assembly: Pre-assembled motor unit with integrated gearbox
MRO_Part1: Specialized tools for e-bike maintenance
MRO_Part2: Cleaning and lubrication kit for regular upkeep
MRO_Part3: Diagnostic equipment for electronic systems

work_centers.name: Frame Fabrication
work_centers.description: Area for cutting, shaping, and welding bike frames

work_centers.name: Wheel Production
work_centers.description: Assembly line for wheel building and truing

work_centers.name: Paint and Finish
work_centers.description: Automated paint booth and manual finishing area

work_centers.name: Battery Production
work_centers.description: Clean room for battery cell assembly and testing

work_centers.name: Motor Assembly
work_centers.description: Precision assembly line for electric motors

work_centers.name: Final Assembly Line 1
work_centers.description: Main assembly line for complete e-bikes

work_centers.name: Final Assembly Line 2
work_centers.description: Secondary assembly line for overflow and special orders

work_centers.name: Packaging and Shipping
work_centers.description: Area for final packaging and preparation for shipment

frame: Welding quality meets or exceeds standards
No visible defects or stress points in frame structure
Frame size and geometry match specifications
All mounting points correctly positioned and threaded
paint: Paint finish smooth and even across all surfaces
No runs, drips, or orange peel effect observed
Color matches specified shade within acceptable range
Decals applied correctly and without bubbles
Clear coat evenly applied and fully cured
wheels: Wheel true and round within 0.5mm tolerance
Spoke tension even and within specified range
Hub bearings smooth with no play
Tire bead seated properly with even spacing
drivetrain: Derailleur alignment correct for all gears
Bottom bracket smoothly rotating without play
brakes: Brake pads aligned correctly with rim/rotor
Hydraulic system properly bled with no leaks
Brake lever feel firm with appropriate travel
Braking power meets safety standards in testing
Rotors true and free from contamination
electronics: Battery capacity meets or exceeds rated specification
Motor output and efficiency within expected range
Control unit firmware up to date
All electrical connections secure and waterproof
Display functions correctly with accurate readings
final_assembly: All components securely fastened to torque specifications
Cables and housing routed correctly without kinks
Headset adjusted for smooth rotation without play
Pedals thread in smoothly and are secure
Quick release/thru-axles function correctly and are secure
quality_control: Test ride completed, all systems functioning as expected
Shifting smooth and accurate across all gears
Braking performance even and within safety standards
No unusual noises or vibrations during operation
All reflectors and safety features present and secure
packaging: All included accessories present and undamaged
Protective packaging correctly applied to frame and components
User manual and warranty information included
Shipping box undamaged and correctly labeled
Battery charge level within safe shipping range
